original_text: And they have built the high places of Topheth, which is in the Valley of the Son of Hinnom, to burn their sons and their daughters in the fire, which I did not command, nor did it come into my mind.
korean_text: 힌놈의 아들 골짜기에 도벳 사당을 건축하고 그들의 자녀들을 불에 살랐나니 내가 명령하지 아니하였고 내 마음에 생각하지도 아니한 일이니라

sentences.original_text: And they have built the high places of Topheth,
which is in the Valley of the Son of Hinnom,
to burn their sons and their daughters in the fire,
sentences.korean_translation: 불로 그들의 아들과 딸을 태우기 위해

sentences.original_text: nor did it come into my mind.
